tasks.title: GATE.X.TWEAKS.DATA.001: Tweakability contract v0: all balance constants used by Slice 2.5%Slice 3 systems (worldgen MINs, fees, capacity K defaults, risk scalars, loop viability thresholds, role risk_tolerance) are loaded from a versioned data file (eg. JSON) with deterministic parsing and stable defaults; simulation records the config hash in transcripts; tests can override config via a deterministic fixture without code changes
